models.prompt:
What is the value of this expression?

 $\frac{7^3}{7^6}$

feedback.value: Correct. The student correctly subtracted 3 - 6 = -3, then simplified  $\frac{1}{7^3}$  and did the math.
The student divided the exponent numbers,  $\frac{6}{3}$ =2, then simplified  $\frac{1}{7^2}$ to get this answer.
The student divided the exponents but instead of the exponent in the denominator, used it in the numerator.
The correctly student subtracted the exponents but instead of the exponent in the denominator, used it in the numerator.

models.incorrectFeedback: e.g. Oops, this was a wrong answer!
